layout.settings_form: <%= form_for :custom_settings, :url=> customize_layout_path(@layout.guid), :method=>"PUT" do |customize_form| custom_params = @layout.get_scheme_params(@layout_scheme).merge(@layout.custom_settings.h) content_tag(:ul, :class=>"tabs") do content_tag(:li, content_tag(:a, "Backgrounds")) + content_tag(:li, content_tag(:a, "Fonts & Colors")) end + content_tag(:div, :class=>"panes") do content_tag(:div, :id=>"background_pane") do param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("header_background_image"), :width=>950, :height=>170, :id=>"header_background_image") + " " + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("background_image"), :id=>"background_image", :width=>1920, :height=>1200) + " " + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("body_background_image"), :id=>"body_background_image", :width=>950, :height=>1200) end + content_tag(:div, :id=>"colors_pane") do content_tag(:div, :id=>"title_fields") do param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("title_font"), :id=>"title_font") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("title_color"), :id=>"title_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("subtitle_font"), :id=>"subtitle_font") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("subtitle_color"), :id=>"subtitle_color") end + content_tag(:div, :id=>"color_fields") do custom_params.values.sort{|x,y| x.name <=> y.name}.collect do |param| param_field(customize_form, param, :id=>param.name) end.join("").html_safe end end end + button_tag("Save", :class=>"save_button", :id=>"save_button", :type=>"submit") end %>
